businessmodel.order

Class Order

  • java.lang.Object
    • businessmodel.order.Order
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SingleTaskOrder, StandardCarOrder

    public abstract class Order
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing an abstract order.
    Author:
    SWOP Team 10 2014
